0.27.name: wordpress/wordpress-sinhala-comments
0.27.description: If you have a Sinhala Wordpress Blog, this Plugin is a must have. This Plugin make it really easy to comment in Sinhala. There is no need of any other Sites or Software. Use this plugin and help users to express themselves in there own words...
